tool_description: All-in-one global package tracking tool. Support track and trace international 472 couriers.
name: TrackingMore_v2
title: TrackingMore

api_list.name: carriers/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com/carriers/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com/carriers/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description: Get tracking information of specific package

parameters.name: carrierCode
parameters.description: Carrier code gotten from .../carriers/list or carriers/detect endpoint
